full_text: Page 994 Fwd: Need you to reconstruct 292 data for Inmate Epstein, 76318-054 From (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) To Sonya Thompson Date 2019/08/12 08:25 Subject Fwd: Need you to reconstruct 292 data for Inmate Epstein, 76318-054 Attachments TEXT.htm, Re: Need you to reconstruct 292 data for Inmate Epstein, 76318-054 See attached.
